text: (upbeat music)
- Hello, I'm Colton Malkerson,
Director of Partnerships at Stability AI.

Stability AI is the world's
leading multimodal, open,
generative AI company.
We're building generative AI solutions

across multiple modalities,
including image, language,
code, audio, 3D, video, and more.

We're excited that AWS
customers can now leverage
our latest state-of-the-art image model,

Stable Diffusion XL,
through Amazon Bedrock.
Amazon Bedrock is a fully-managed service

that allows AWS customers
to access foundation models
via an API.

Bedrock will enable tens
of thousands of developers

and millions of users
worldwide to leverage the power

of Stable Diffusion XL
with a robust set of tools

to build generative
AI-powered applications.
Stable Diffusion XL is a text-to-image

and image-to-image foundation
model that has the power
to transform generative AI image creation
and enhance the creative capabilities
of users around the world.
Stable Diffusion will unlock innovation,

decrease time to market, and
lower costs for customers.
The use cases are endless,
but the most common ones we've seen
are in advertising and marketing,
media and entertainment, and gaming.

Users can create
personalized ad campaigns,

virtually limitless amounts
of marketing collateral,

they can augment creative
teams, ideate with storyboards,
and localize content and visuals.

Stable Diffusion XL is
particularly well-tuned
for vibrant and accurate colors

with better contrast,
lighting, and shadows
than its predecessor, all in multiple,
high-definition aspect ratios.

Customers can get started
today with Stable Diffusion XL
and Amazon Bedrock.

With Bedrock, users
can privately customize
Stable Diffusion XL using their own data
and easily integrate and deploy the model

into their applications using
AWS tools and capabilities,

without having to manage
any infrastructure.

We look forward to
seeing amazing creations

from our community using
Stable Diffusion XL
built on the highly scalable and reliable
AWS Cloud Platform.
(upbeat music)
